definition: To unintentionally fail to remember or recall something, often used in informal conversations or everyday situations.

examples.german: Vergiss nicht, deine Hausaufgaben zu machen.
examples.english: Don't forget to do your homework.
Don't forget to take out the trash.
Don't forget to take your umbrella.

examples.german: Vergiss nicht, rechtzeitig zum Termin zu kommen.
examples.english: Don't forget to come to the appointment on time.
Don't forget to take your keys.
